A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The special effects are the only thing that made this movie from being utterly terrible.  Too many plot holes\,  Too many characters that you don't care about.  I don't think Disney and the director and maybe JJ Abrams get the gist of the original Star Wars Trilogy.   Despite the amazing special effects for the time there was a human element full of emotion and conflict that we are go through in life.  This was just bad theater.
